tags.name: kemet-accordion
tags.description: A component that acts like a standard accordion.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Determines whether or not the accordion is opened.

properties.name: closeOthers
properties.description: Will close all other accordions once the current accordion is opened.

events.name: kemet-accordion-opened
events.description: Fires when an accordion opens.

events.name: kemet-accordion-closed
events.description: Fires when an accordion closes.

slots.name: trigger
slots.description: The element that, when clicked, opens the accordion.

slots.name: panel
slots.description: The body contents of the accordion.

tags.name: kemet-carousel
tags.description: The overall container for the carousel.

properties.name: index
properties.description: Gives and identity to each slide by indexing them.

properties.name: pagination
properties.description: The position your pagination slot appears in. Possible values are: top, right, bottom, left.

properties.name: slideshow
properties.description: The number of seconds to wait for auto slide switching, 0 means don't auto play.

properties.name: useHash
properties.description: Turns on linking to slides by url. It's only met to be used with one carousel on the page.

events.name: kemet-carousel-change-start
events.description: Fires when a slide changes.

events.name: kemet-carousel-change-finished
events.description: Fires after the transition effect of a slide change finishes.

slots.name: pagination
slots.description: If you want a paginator create it here.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-carousel-width
cssProperties.description: Width of the carousel.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-carousel-height
cssProperties.description: Height of the carousel. Default is: 50vh.

cssProperties.name: ::part(slides)
cssProperties.description: The slides.

cssProperties.name: ::part(pagination)
cssProperties.description: The the pagination.

tags.name: kemet-carousel-slide
tags.description: The slide for the carousel.

properties.name: transition
properties.description: An effect for how the slide comes in and out.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-carousel-slide-speed
cssProperties.description: The speed of horizontal and vertical transitions. Default is: 0.3s.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-carousel-slide-fade-speed
cssProperties.description: The speed of the fade transition. Default is: 1s.

tags.name: kemet-carousel-link
tags.description: A link to a slide in the carousel

properties.name: slide
properties.description: Which slide to link to. Goes by 0 based index.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Whether or not the link is current slide.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Allow the users to disable linking until conditions are met.

events.name: kemet-carousel-link
events.description: Fires when a link is clicked.

tags.name: kemet-carousel-prev
tags.description: A link to the previous slide in the carousel

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Allow the users to disable linking until conditions are met.

events.name: kemet-carousel-prev
events.description: Fires when the link is clicked.

tags.name: kemet-carousel-next
tags.description: A link to the next slide in the carousel

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Allow the users to disable linking until conditions are met.

events.name: kemet-carousel-next
events.description: Fires when the link is clicked.

tags.name: kemet-draggable
tags.description: A draggable element with the ability to remember its position.

properties.name: memory
properties.description: A unique identifier used to store the element's position in local storage.

properties.name: top
properties.description: The elements top position in pixels.

properties.name: left
properties.description: The element's left position in pixels.

properties.name: measure
properties.description: If set to true, will measure the width and height of the element's content and apply it to the host element.

events.name: kemet-draggable-start
events.description: Fires when the user starts dragging the element.

events.name: kemet-draggable-stop
events.description: Fires when the user stops dragging the element.

tags.name: kemet-drawer
tags.description: A component that adds an off-canvas menu with different effects.

properties.name: effect
properties.description: The animation effect for opening and closing the drawer. Values include: (slide|reveal|push|scale)

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Determines if the drawer is opened or not.

properties.name: side
properties.description: Allows you to control which side the drawer opens from. Values include: (left|right)

properties.name: overlay
properties.description: Adds a overlay over the content section of the Drawer when opened

events.name: kemet-drawer-opened
events.description: Fires when the drawer opens.

events.name: kemet-drawer-closed
events.description: Fires when the drawer closes.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-width
cssProperties.description: The width of the drawer. Default is 300px.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-height
cssProperties.description: The height of the drawer. Default is 100%.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-color
cssProperties.description: The text color of the drawer. Default is #fafafa.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-background-color
cssProperties.description: The background color of the drawer. Default is #202020.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-drawer-overlay-color
cssProperties.description: The color of the overlay.

tags.name: kemet-flipcard
tags.description: A card that has a front and back side which can be flipped.

properties.name: axis
properties.description: The direction the card flips in. Values include: (horizontal|vertical)

properties.name: flipped
properties.description: Determines whether or not to show the front or back of the card.

properties.name: flipOnHover
properties.description: If true, the card flips on hover and focus.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The measured height of the card in pixels.

properties.name: measure
properties.description: If true, the card will determine the tallest side and apply it's height to the host.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-flipcard-front-color
cssProperties.description: The text color for the front of the card.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-flipcard-back-color
cssProperties.description: The text color for the back of the card.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-flipcard-front-background-color
cssProperties.description: The background color for the front of the card.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-flipcard-back-background-color
cssProperties.description: The background color for the back of the card.

cssProperties.name: ::part(front)
cssProperties.description: The front of the card.

cssProperties.name: ::part(back)
cssProperties.description: The back of the card.

cssProperties.name: ::part(wrapper)
cssProperties.description: A container for both front and back of the card.

tags.name: kemet-flipcard-trigger
tags.description: A trigger for the flipped property of <kemet-flipcard>.

events.name: kemet-flipcard-flipped
events.description: Fires when clicked or when entered key is pressed for a flipped event.

tags.name: kemet-icon
tags.description: An element that represents an icon from a predefined set of open sourced icons.

properties.name: set
properties.description: The sprite map from an open source project that an icon belongs too. Values include: (bootstrap | font-awesome-brand | font-awesome-regular | font-awesome-solid)

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The name of the icon to reference.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The width and height of the icon in pixels.

tags.name: kemet-modal
tags.description: A modal that has many built in effects and flexible styles.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Determines whether or not the modal is opened.

properties.name: effect
properties.description: The opening and closing style of the modal. Possible effects include: (fadein-scaleup | slide-right | slide-bottom | newspaper | fall | side-fall | flip-horizontal | flip-vertical | sign-3d | super-scaled | slit | rotate-bottom | rotate-left)

properties.name: closeOnClick
properties.description: Allows the user to control if clicking the overlay closes the modal.

events.name: kemet-modal-opened
events.description: Fires when a modal opens.

events.name: kemet-modal-closed
events.description: Fires when a modal closes.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-modal-min-width
cssProperties.description: Minimum width of the modal contents. Default: 0.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-modal-max-width
cssProperties.description: Maximum with of the modal contents. Default: none.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-modal-overlay-background-color
cssProperties.description: The color of the modal's overlay. Default: rgba(0,0,0,0.2).

cssProperties.name: --kemet-modal-transition-speed
cssProperties.description: Speed for revealing the modal. Default: 0.3s.

cssProperties.name: ::part(content)
cssProperties.description: Contains the content for the modal.

cssProperties.name: ::part(overlay)
cssProperties.description: Contains the overlay for the modal.

tags.name: kemet-popover
tags.description: Displays an element in position of a trigger. Also acts as a tooltip.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Determines whether or not the popover displays.

properties.name: effect
properties.description: The opening and closing effect of the popover. Is optional. Values include: (fade | scale | slide | fall | flip horizontal | flip vertical | sign | super scaled)

properties.name: position
properties.description: Determines the placement of the popover. Values include: (top | right | bottom | left)

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: Adds a build in tooltip to the popover.

properties.name: customTooltip
properties.description: Adds a custom tooltip to the popover. Use the custom-tooltip slot to specify the custom tooltip.

properties.name: fireOnClick
properties.description: Controls whether or not the tooltip triggers on click.

properties.name: fireOnHover
properties.description: Controls whether or not the tooltip triggers on hover.

properties.name: clickOutside
properties.description: Allows the popover to be closed by clicking outside of its content.

events.name: kemet-popover-opened
events.description: Fires when the popover opens.

events.name: kemet-popover-closed
events.description: Fires when the popover closes.

slots.name: trigger
slots.description: Controls opening and closing the popover.

slots.name: custom-tooltip
slots.description: Allows you to use an svg, image, custom css, etc for a custom tooltip.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-width
cssProperties.description: The width of the popover contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-height
cssProperties.description: The height of the popover contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-color
cssProperties.description: The text color of the popover's contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-background-color
cssProperties.description: The background color of the popover's contents.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-gap
cssProperties.description: The space between the trigger and content.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-popover-transition-speed
cssProperties.description: The speed of the opening and closing effect.

cssProperties.name: ::part(trigger)
cssProperties.description: Contains the trigger for the popover.

cssProperties.name: ::part(content)
cssProperties.description: Contains the content for the popover.

cssProperties.name: ::part(tooltip)
cssProperties.description: Contains the tooltip for the popover.

cssProperties.name: ::part(custom-tooltip)
cssProperties.description: Contains the custom tooltip for the popover.

tags.name: kemet-ratio
tags.description: Displays a box given an aspect ratio. Especially useful for embeds.

properties.name: aspectRatio
properties.description: The aspect ratio of the box.

cssProperties.name: ::part(container)
cssProperties.description: Contains your content.

tags.name: kemet-rotator
tags.description: A component that rotates through an array of text.

properties.name: activeSlide
properties.description: The index number for the current slide.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the rotator block.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the rotator block.

properties.name: messages
properties.description: Text in the rotator. Supports HTML.

properties.name: effect
properties.description: The transition effect type.

properties.name: rotationSpeed
properties.description: How fast, in seconds, each slide lasts. Stop the rotator with 0.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-rotator-transition-speed
cssProperties.description: How long, in css time units, the transition effect lasts.

tags.name: kemet-scroll-link
tags.description: A component that adds a smooth scrolling link to an target.

properties.name: element
properties.description: A DOM element that establishes the context of scrolling.

properties.name: target
properties.description: A DOM element that represents the destination of the scroll link

properties.name: xOffset
properties.description: Allows the horizontal scrolling to stop short of the given value.

properties.name: yOffset
properties.description: Allows the vertical scrolling to stop short of the given value.

tags.name: kemet-scroll-nav
tags.description: An element that transforms at a scroll point.

properties.name: effect
properties.description: Determines where the transform point is activated. Values include: (sticky | resize)

properties.name: transform
properties.description: Whether or not the nav has shifted into a new state.

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Allows for an arbitrary adjustment of the transform point in pixels. Works with negative values.

tags.name: kemet-scroll-snap
tags.description: A scroll-snap implementation for responsive sliders.

properties.name: axis
properties.description: Determines the direction the component flows. Values include: (horizontal|vertical)

properties.name: pagination
properties.description: Determines where to display the paginator. Values include: (top|right|bottom|left)

properties.name: isTouchDevice
properties.description: Is set if touch capabilities are detected.

properties.name: slides
properties.description: An array of objects containing info about the slides.

events.name: kemet-scroll-snap-make-slides
events.description: Fires when slide data has been created.

slots.name: pagination
slots.description: Place the paginator component here if you want one.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-gap
cssProperties.description: Space between the slides. Default is: 0.

tags.name: kemet-scroll-snap-slide
tags.description: A slide for kemet-scroll-snap.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: Is true when the slide is fully visible in it's container.

properties.name: index
properties.description: Identifies the slide.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-slide-width
cssProperties.description: The width of the slide. Default is: 100%.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-slide-align
cssProperties.description: The scroll-snap alignment. Default is: center.

tags.name: kemet-scroll-snap-paginator
tags.description: A paginator for the scroll snap component.

properties.name: slides
properties.description: Information about each slide

properties.name: icon
properties.description: A character icon used for each page in the pagination iterator.

properties.name: useNumberPages
properties.description: If set to true, the pages in the pagination iterator will appear as a set of numbers.

properties.name: useLabelPages
properties.description: If set to true, the pages in the pagination iterator will appear as the label set on the slide.

events.name: kemet-scroll-snap-focus
events.description: Fires when a set of slides are focused on.

tags.name: kemet-svgs
tags.description: A set of SVG graphics that can be referenced any where in a page or app.

properties.name: set
properties.description: Defines the name for the set of svgs.

tags.name: kemet-svg
tags.description: An individual svg graphic to display from a set.

properties.name: set
properties.description: Defines which set of svgs is referenced.

properties.name: svg
properties.description: The name (id) of the svg to be displayed.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Sets the width and height of a the svg to the given value in pixels.

properties.name: ratio
properties.description: The value for the preserveAspectRatio attribute of the svg.

properties.name: viewBox
properties.description: The value for the viewBox attribute of the svg.

cssProperties.name: ::part(svg)
cssProperties.description: The svg element.

tags.name: kemet-tabs
tags.description: The tabs container element.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Represents which tab is currently selected.

events.name: kemet-tab-changed
events.description: Called when a tab is changed.

slots.name: links
slots.description: The tabs that link to a panel.

slots.name: panel
slots.description: The content that corresponds to each tab.

tags.name: kemet-tab
tags.description: A tab that serves as a link to a panel.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Is applied to the active tab.

properties.name: link
properties.description: Represents which panel corresponds to the tab.

events.name: kemet-tab-changed
events.description: Called when a tab is changed.

tags.name: kemet-tab-panel
tags.description: Shows the contents of a tab.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Is applied to the active panel.

properties.name: panel
properties.description: The name of the panel for linking purposes.
